breakfast.name: Mediterranean Veggie Scramble
breakfast.instructions: Heat olive oil in pan, sauté peppers and tomatoes, add spinach until wilted, scramble eggs with vegetables, top with feta, serve with toast

lunch.name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
lunch.instructions: Cook quinoa, roast chickpeas with spices, arrange all ingredients in bowl, drizzle with tahini dressing

dinner.name: Eggplant Parmesan with Side Salad
dinner.instructions: Bread and bake eggplant slices, layer with sauce and cheese, bake until golden, serve with fresh salad

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait with Berries
breakfast.instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in glass, top with honey, chia seeds, and banana slices

lunch.name: Caprese Grilled Cheese with Tomato Soup
lunch.instructions: Assemble sandwich with cheese, tomato, and basil, grill until golden, heat soup, drizzle sandwich with balsamic glaze

dinner.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu and Brown Rice
dinner.instructions: Cook brown rice, press and cube tofu, stir-fry tofu until golden, add vegetables and seasonings, serve over rice

day_before: Cook quinoa and store in refrigerator
day_1_morning: Make tahini dressing for buddha bowl

goal_alignment_analysis.general_health: This plan provides balanced nutrition with adequate protein, complex carbohydrates, and healthy fats to support overall wellness
goal_alignment_analysis.vegetarian_focus: All meals are completely vegetarian, featuring plant-based proteins from quinoa, chickpeas, tofu, and dairy sources
goal_alignment_analysis.allergy_safety: Strictly nut-free plan with nut-free granola and pumpkin seeds as safe alternatives for crunch and nutrition
goal_alignment_analysis.variety: High variety achieved through different cuisines (Mediterranean, Asian, Italian) and cooking methods (grilling, roasting, stir-frying)
goal_alignment_analysis.budget_moderate: Uses affordable staples like eggs, quinoa, tofu, and seasonal vegetables while including some premium items like feta and fresh mozzarella
goal_alignment_analysis.prep_moderate: Prep times range from 10-45 minutes with some advance preparation options to reduce daily cooking time
